1.0.name: wordpress/press-pay
1.0.description: Press Pay is a fast and easy way to turn your WordPress Blog into a Web Store. After signing up for an account with Stripe, insert a shortcode into any Page or Post and you'll be given a payment button which pops up a credit card form when pressed. Your customers enter their credit card information in the form and Stripe processes the sale. Simple, Easy, Straightforward.
